Create a virtual reality experience where users can explore a planet made entirely of ice cream.
Develop an app that generates personalized ice cream recipes based on user preferences and dietary restrictions.
Host a social media contest where users can share their favorite ice cream creations and win prizes.
Create an ice cream-themed escape room where participants must solve puzzles and clues to unlock different flavors of ice cream.
Collaborate with a local ice cream shop to create a limited-edition flavor inspired by a famous landmark or event in the city.
